title: My Two Biggest Passions
description: Forming a part of the ClassPass team is a unique opportunity to pursue my two biggest passions—design and health.

content.text: I hope you had a great holiday break and 2017 is going well. Thank you for the opportunity to share my design process, I had a great time working through the UX assignment. After our chat over the holidays I've been learning more about the story of ClassPass and have fallen deeply in love with it's mission because one of the reasons I exercise daily and focus on proper nutrition is because of the positive impact it has on my other interests. The opportunity to join the ClassPass team is a unique opportunity where I'll be able to work on my two passions—design and health.

I've exercised my entire life and was brought up in a family that valued staying active and eating well. Throughout my childhood and through high school I played competitive soccer, where I learned about the importance of proper nutrition, consistency, and team work. During college I tore my ACL, which put my ability to play soccer on pause. During that time I got really into weight lifting and proper nutrition. I spent my college focusing on my classes and working on getting into the best shape possible. Since then I've been working out early in the morning during the week, which has helped me

Forming a part of the ClassPass team is an opportunity to help others do exactly what I’ve been doing all my life—lead an active life to fully perform in my other interests. My interest in leading a healthy life will help me better understand ClassPass member struggles because their struggles are also my struggles. I’m excited to learn about the product to make it easier for others to attend class and because I want to go to class as part of ClassPass. I want to live the ClassPass experience. I’m confident that my interest in leading a healthy life, my hunger to learn about design and development, and my current design/development skills will help me better appreciate the challenges and struggles ClassPass faces to successfully develop the right business solutions with the ClassPass team.

I’d love to chat more about my background and my experience anytime. I’m extremely excited about the opportunity to form a part of the team as I’ll be able to pursue my two biggest passions simultaneously to help people lead active, healthy lives.
